text: Yo pana bhikkhu kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 11. Should any bhikkhu have a felt (blanket/rug) made of a mixture containing silk, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
๑๑. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใดให้ทำสันถัตเจือด้วยไหม เป็นนิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์
11. Should any bhikkhu get a (felted) rug made mixed with silk this entails expiation with forfeiture.
